title: Global Vegetation Types, 1971-1982 (Matthews)
summary: A global digital data base of vegetation was compiled at 1 degree latitude by 1 degree longitude resolution, drawing on approximately 100 published sources.  Vegetation data from varied sources were consistently recorded using the hierarchical UNESCO classification system.  The raw data base distinguishes about 180 vegetation types that have been collapsed to 32.
